     ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸                                                                   ÃƒÅ¸ÃƒÅ¸

        ConvertXtoDVD is a software to convert and burn your videos to
        DVD. With ConvertXtoDVD and in a few clicks you can backup your
        movies to DVD playable on any home DVD player.

        ConvertXtoDVD supports most popular format such Xvid, MOV, VOB,
        Mpeg, Mpeg4, MP4, AVI, WMV, DV and stream formats. It converts
        your files into a compliant DVD Video set of files and burns it
        on a DVD media.

        The aspect ratio can be automatically selected or forced to a
        specific format. The program works for NTSC and PAL video formats
        and creates chapters automatically. Multiple audio tracks are
        supported. Version 2 uses a completely rewritten interface with
        subtitles support and a lot of new settings.

        VSO ConvertXtoDVD is neither affiliated with, nor using
        technology from Divx Networks!


        Key features: 

        Ã‚Â· Supported video formats: DivX, Xvid, MPEG4, MOV, AVI, WMV, WMV
          HD, DV, and more... 
        Ã‚Â· Supported sources: existing files from digital camcorders,
          TV/Sat, capture cards
        Ã‚Â· Can merge up to 4 hours of material from several movies or
          episodes
        Ã‚Â· Supported audio formats: AC3, DTS, PCM, OGG, MP3, and more...
        Ã‚Â· Handles subtitles files (.SRT .SUB/IDX) with color and font
          selection, and supports tags (italic, bold)
        Ã‚Â· Video format choice: NTSC, PAL, or automatic and PULL-DOWN
        Ã‚Â· Picture output: Widescreen, Fullscreen, or automatic
        Ã‚Â· Create Automatic chapters or edit your owns
        Ã‚Â· Fast preview mode to check if the source is loaded correctly
        Ã‚Â· Save the DVD structure on hard drive or burn it to a blank DVD
        Ã‚Â· Reliable burn engine integrated (supports all DVD formats)
        Ã‚Â· Fast and quality encoder (typically less than 1 hour for
          converting 1 movie)
        Ã‚Â· Variable options and settings for advanced users
        Ã‚Â· Control of the conversion speed vs quality
        Ã‚Â· DVD Menu control (auto-start, loop etc)
        Ã‚Â· DVD Menu edition (background, fond, color)
        Ã‚Â· Customizable interface (themes, dockable windows)
        Ã‚Â· Multilingual support (available languages...)
        Ã‚Â· Optimized for Windows 2000 / XP / Vista
